A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A few flaws here and there\, it's not perfect. But I enjoyed the crap out of this. I mean... I loved it. So many twists\, nothing went as I thought it would\, and I love it when such a major story with so much speculation swirling around it can surprise and buck the expected narrative. I could have done without some side plots\, a few new characters here and there\, but it's basically a 9/10 despite that\, for me. Good laughs\, however uncharacteristic of the franchise thus far they were in nature\, but it largely was serious when it needed to be. I have some questions\, and I feel like there may be some inconsistencies\, but I'm hoping they'll be made more clear in the next film. Loved it!
